page.title: 05A Village Shop
page.content: The owner of the shop has lived in West Buckland for 2\ years.She moved to this village because the shop was the cheapiest availiable in the area.They have a car and a van for deliveries. Their shop is very important for the village life and many old and young people use it because it is the only shop. The owner does not get very much leisure time,but when the shop is quiet she has time to do things. The owner thinks she will benefit when there is more traffic going passed the shop after the link road is built.The shop owner thinks she has made improvements to the shop by buying a new meat slicer and a freezer to improve the service for their customers Simon Foster,Simon Thake,D.Lewis.
